misc: Known for bomb drives despite his advanced age.
biography: Harri, affectionately known in golfing circles as "the doctor", is a celebrated veteran of the Hattula Golf club, renowned for his strategic mind and surprisingly powerful drives, a testament to his dedication to the sport despite his age.

A familiar face at the Hector Trophée, Harri will make his sixth appearance in 2025. With two Hector Trophée wins under his belt, he brings a wealth of experience and competitive spirit to the greens.
Although the coveted Victor Trophy has eluded him so far, Harri's consistent performance and tactical prowess make him a formidable opponent in both individual and pair formats.
